metadata.title: Astra Linux CE 1.8 (Orel) is installed
metadata.description: Astra Linux Ð¡ommon Edition 1.8 (Orel) is installed. Astra Linux is the first official security Debian derivative in Russia. It runs on the x86-64 hardware platform (amd64). Its structure includes many free software components and additionally also software decisions of the Astra Linux developers. Astra Linux CE with codenamed Orel is a release for "general purpose" aimed at "achieving small and mid-business goals".
